humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 7 cm (3 cm in this specimen and 4 cm in previous lumpectomy). Based on the rules provided, a T3 tumor is more than 5 cm. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive component of the tumor is given as 7 cm (3 cm in this specimen and 4 cm in previous lumpectomy). Therefore, the T stage is T3, as the tumor is more than 5.0 cm in greatest dimension.
